Functions
LR_fnc_SpawnExplosives
Description

Utility function for spawning explosions and secondaries on objects, positions or objectives.

Parameters
_delay

The delay in seconds until the explosives go off

_pos

The position of the objective about to blow up

_sub

Array containing the following information: [Amount of Secondaries, Delay after Main Explosion, Radius around _pos]

_method

The type of destruction we want, that is the type of exlosive (Default: Mortar round)

Return Values

None

Examples

Nothing to see here

Author

Martin (original: YAINA_..._fnc_destroy), ported and adjusted by Mokka
